occupation: Chief Technology Officer at uwi homes
headline: (YC S22). #fintech #ycombinator #proptech
summary: I am a strong believer in the 80/20 rule and I actively apply that in my daily life.  I push to do the most possible good with the least expenditure of time or resources and have consistently delivered.  My technical background has allowed me to leverage technology to find ways to generate value, increase efficiency and productivity for the people around me.

experiences.title: General Manager
experiences.description: Overall head of the Philippines branch of gumi Asia Pte. Ltd.

experiences.title: Engineering Manager
experiences.description:
Was responsible for ensuring a timely response to infrastructure related issues as well as client and server feature development support to main development teams in Singapore.  Was in charge of a team that provides 24/7 infrastructure monitoring and response to existing gumi Asia Pte. Ltd. games hosted on AWS and Google Cloud Platform.

Notable achievements:
• Created alerting tools, scripts and dashboards for NOC engineers to significantly decrease response time to any infrastructure issue.

experiences.title: Technical Director
experiences.description:
Served as a technical expert representative across mobile production teams
and internal clients. Established standards, guidelines and procedures to
measure and accelerate project progress. Offered technical support across
projects, mentored development teams all along the production life cycle from
technical design to applications delivery.  Defined middleware, engines, framework
to facilitate, improve and optimise production.  Suggested alternative technical
solutions to meet with client requirements more efficiently. Tracked and identified
new opportunities to improve methodology. Evaluated development teams and
built developing plans for performance improvement. Ensured technical training
and induction of new developer hires.

Notable achievements:
• Developed systems and procedures to reduce porting time of Linux based
platform projects from 3 weeks to one day.
• Created core code used by Gameloft Pad for LG TV.  A novel application which allows a user to use their smartphone as a controller for a number of games on the LG Smart TV platform.

experiences.title: Lead Game Developer
experiences.description:
Was responsible for task estimation, breakdown, and assignments to developer
team. Provided mentoring and direction to team members. Communicated
progress and issues of the project to designated project managers and
superiors.

Notable achievements:
• Singlehandedly implemented online multiplayer for a game on a linux platform.
(Shrek Kart Freebox)
• Pioneered development and porting to the IPad platform.
• Pioneered development and porting to the HTML5 platform. (GT Racing HTML5)
• Created the processes and practices required for porting Gameloft games to 
various Linux-based platforms.

experiences.title: Embedded Systems Training Officer
experiences.description:
Served a general role as a trainer for programming languages and other computer
science concepts. Also performed a more specific role as an instructor
of embedded systems technologies.

Notable achievements:
• Main contributor to the school’s Embedded Linux curriculum.
• Instrumental in the school’s victory in the Microcontroller Applications
Design Competition (MADC 2008) – Classic Line Following Division.

experiences.company: Philippine Batteries Inc. (Ramcar Group of Companies)
experiences.title: Process Design Engineer
experiences.description:
Formulated, through hypothesis and experimentation, new processes to improve productivity in
automotive battery manufacturing.

Notable achievements:
• Reduced dry cell formation process from 24 hours to 16 hours.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Rank 8th in the Metallurgical Engineer National Board Examination
accomplishment_honors_awards.issuer: Society of Metallurgical Engineers of the Philippines (SMEP)
